name: Super Tank Tank
description:
Super Tank Tank is a mess around action adventure game. You have a checklist of items for you to accomplish.

The steering can be tricky let off the throttle when turning if you're having trouble. Or put pedal to the metal if you want to be the fastest tank out there!

Controls

The game works best with a gamepad!

Right Stick / Mouse - Aim

Right Trigger / LMB - Shoot

Left Stick / WASD - Steering

Left Trigger / Spacebar - Accelerate

Left Bumper / Shift -  Brake

Note about the jam

Super Tank Tank was made for GMTK 2021. The theme was joined together. Unfortunately we didn't feel we had time to integrate the mechanic that would fit the theme. Instead we salvaged what we could and made this game!

Originally the tank was going to have a grappling hook for you to swing enemies around and utilize different properties of objects.
